title: "Man Receives Mystery Pizza Deliveries For A Decade, Self-Driving Cars Not To Blame, As Yet"
excerpt: "A recent news report indicates that a man has been receiving pizza deliveries for nearly a decade. That might not seem like earth-shattering news, except for the fact that the pizzas were not ordered by the man and he says that he has no idea why the pizzas are coming to him."
